aboutMe.title: About TangMo
aboutMe.imageAlt: Dwawing of TangMo dog nibbwing on a watewmewon
aboutMe.para: Hewwo! I’m a dog (maybe) fwom Thaiwand, wiving faw fwom home. Da name, TangMo, witewawwy twanswates to “watewmewon”. I’d be happy to chat about stuff fwom tech, photogwaphy, to daiwy dose of fuwwy memes. Being “wewativewy” new to da fandom, it’s nice to meet evewyone.

aboutChara.title: About da chawactew
aboutChara.para: I… I hazn’t stawted wowking on da chawactew yet. Da image hewe is just a pwacehowdew, awthough I might use him as da stawting point fow da actuaw chawactew. etc.
